entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
